title: Build and lead the team
description: Create clarity on roles, norms, and communication cadence.

title: Engage stakeholders
description: Maintain two-way communication and expectations with sponsors, customers, and teams.

title: Plan and manage scope
description: Translate objectives into a roadmap, backlog, and acceptance criteria.

title: Assure quality
description: Define Definition of Done, quality thresholds, and validation activities.

title: Deliver value and benefits
description: Measure outcomes against benefits and pivot when value is at risk.

title: Ensure compliance
description: Surface regulatory or policy constraints and bake them into delivery.
